General.Name: Bright Real Estate Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Bright Real Estate Group Co.,Limited develops residential and commercial real estate properties in China. It develops and operates commercial blocks, office buildings, and hotels; provides property management, asset operation, and community services; general contracting of housing, municipal public, water conservancy, and hydropower engineering construction works; and professional contracting of decoration projects. The company is also involved in the urban services; production and installation of doors, windows, and curtain walls; procurement of materials; and labor subcontracting, agent construction management, and other services. In addition, it engages in the cold chain logistics business; and imports, trades in, and sells alcoholic beverages. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 199, Xizang North Road, Shanghai, China
